Class BBjGridExWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • BBjWidget
      • BBjGridExWidget

  • public class BBjGridExWidget
extends BBjWidget
    A Grid Widget Plugin for BBj

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      DataRow AttributesRecord! 
      BBjGridContextMenu ContextMenu!
      The grid context menu
      static BBjNumber Debug 
      BBjString DefaultType$
      Define the edit type Set the default cell editor type default to GRID_TYPE_BASIC_STRING This option is used only in case the grid failed to detect the field's type
      BBjNumber Editable!
      Enable / Disable cell editing for the whole grid 1 = enable editing 0 = disable edition This option can be overridden from the column attributes directly ex: dr!
      BBjString EditType$
      Define the edit behavior
      BBjNumber EnableFilter!
      Allow filters in the grid 1 = enable 0 = disable
      BBjNumber EnableFloatingFilter!
      Allow floating filters in the grid 1 = enable 0 = disable
      BBjNumber EnablePivot!
      Enable/disable pivot by column via the GUI. 1 = enable editing 0 = disable edition This option can be overridden from the column attributes directly ex: dr!
      BBjNumber EnableRowGroup!
      Enable/disable row group by column via the GUI 1 = enable editing 0 = disable edition This option can be overridden from the column attributes directly ex: dr!
      BBjNumber EnableValue!
      Enable/disable aggregate by column via the GUI. 1 = enable editing 0 = disable edition This option can be overridden from the column attributes directly ex: dr!
      BBjString EnterKeyBehavior$
      Enter Key Behavior
      BBjNumber FunctionsReadOnly!
      Enable/disable changes to group, pivot or values through the GUI This is useful if you want to show the user the group, pivot and values panel, so they can see what columns are used, but prevent them from making changes to the selection. 1 = enable editing 0 = disable edition
      BBjString GroupColumnFooterGetter$
      Set the default grouping footer getter expression
      BBjString GroupColumnLabel$
      set the label for the group column if the grid is a tree-grid defaults to "Group"
      BBjNumber GroupEdit!
      Set to true to enable Group Editing, otherwise by default, row groups cannot be edited.
      BBjNumber GroupIncludeFooter!
      If true then includes a 'grand' total across all groups 1 = enable 0 = disable
      BBjNumber GroupIncludeTotalFooter!
      If true then includes group totals within each group level 1 = enable 0 = disable
      BBjNumber GroupMultiAutoColumn!
      If using auto column, set to true to have each group in its own column separate column.
      BBjNumber GroupSelectsChildren!
      When true, selecting a group will have the impact of selecting all its children When false, then the group is selectable independently of the child nodes
      BBjNumber GroupUseEntireRow!
      If grouping, set to true or false (default is false).
      static BBjString LicenseKey$
      Ag Grid enterprise key
      BBjNumber MultipleSelection!
      Allow selection of multiple cells or rows multiple: 1 allows multiple selection, 0 denies
      BBjString RowGroupPanelShow$
      Set group panel visiblity
      java.util.HashMap SelectedRowsMap!
      A map which keeps tracking selected and deselected rows
      BBjNumber SelectionMode!
      set the selection mode of the grid
      BBjNumber ShowGroupChildCount!
      Enable/disable Suppress the number of items in a group 1 = enable 0 = disable
      BBjNumber ShowGroupSelectionCheckbox!
      When true, selection box will be show on group column When false, no checkbox will be displayed
      BBjNumber ShowSelectionCheckbox!
      When true, selection box will be show on the first column When false, no checkbox will be displayed
      BBjNumber SingleClickEdit!
      Enable / Disable cell editing for the whole grid 1 = enable editing 0 = disable edition
      BBjNumber SuppressColumnExpandAll!
      suppress Expand / Collapse all widget. 1 = enable editing 0 = disable edition
      BBjNumber SuppressColumnFilter!
      suppress Column Filter section. 1 = enable editing 0 = disable edition
      BBjNumber SuppressColumnSelectAll!
      suppress Select / Un-select all widget. 1 = enable editing 0 = disable edition
      BBjNumber SuppressPivotMode!
      suppress Pivot Mode section. 1 = enable editing 0 = disable edition
      BBjNumber SuppressPivots!
      suppress Column Labels (Pivot) section. 1 = enable editing 0 = disable edition
      BBjNumber SuppressRowGroups!
      Suppress Row Groups section. 1 = enable editing 0 = disable edition
      BBjNumber SuppressSideButtons!
      suppress Side Buttons section. 1 = enable editing 0 = disable edition
      BBjNumber SuppressValues!
      suppress Values section 1 = enable editing 0 = disable edition

      • SelectionMode!

        public BBjNumber SelectionMode!
        set the selection mode of the grid
        See Also:
        GRID_SELECT_ROW(), GRID_SELECT_CELL()

      • MultipleSelection!

        public BBjNumber MultipleSelection!
        Allow selection of multiple cells or rows multiple: 1 allows multiple selection, 0 denies

      • ShowSelectionCheckbox!

        public BBjNumber ShowSelectionCheckbox!
        When true, selection box will be show on the first column When false, no checkbox will be displayed

      • ShowGroupSelectionCheckbox!

        public BBjNumber ShowGroupSelectionCheckbox!
        When true, selection box will be show on group column When false, no checkbox will be displayed

      • GroupSelectsChildren!

        public BBjNumber GroupSelectsChildren!
        When true, selecting a group will have the impact of selecting all its children When false, then the group is selectable independently of the child nodes

      • Editable!

        public BBjNumber Editable!
        Enable / Disable cell editing for the whole grid 1 = enable editing 0 = disable edition This option can be overridden from the column attributes directly ex: dr! = new DataRow() dr!.setFieldAttribute("DOUBLE", "EDITABLE", "1")

      • SingleClickEdit!

        public BBjNumber SingleClickEdit!
        Enable / Disable cell editing for the whole grid 1 = enable editing 0 = disable edition

      • DefaultType$

        public BBjString DefaultType$
        Define the edit type Set the default cell editor type default to GRID_TYPE_BASIC_STRING This option is used only in case the grid failed to detect the field's type
        See Also:
        BBjGridExWidget.GRID_TYPE_BASIC_STRING, BBjGridExWidget.GRID_TYPE_BASIC_TEXT, BBjGridExWidget.GRID_TYPE_BASIC_NUMBER, BBjGridExWidget.GRID_TYPE_BASIC_BOOLEAN, BBjGridExWidget.GRID_TYPE_BASIC_DATE, BBjGridExWidget.GRID_TYPE_BASIC_TIMESTAMP, BBjGridExWidget.GRID_TYPE_BASIC_IMAGE, BBjGridExWidget.GRID_TYPE_BASIC_IMAGE_FILTERABLE

      • EditType$

        public BBjString EditType$
        Define the edit behavior
        See Also:
        BBjGridExWidget.GRID_EDITTYPE_ROW, BBjGridExWidget.GRID_EDITTYPE_CELL

      • GroupEdit!

        public BBjNumber GroupEdit!
        Set to true to enable Group Editing, otherwise by default, row groups cannot be edited.

      • RowGroupPanelShow$

        public BBjString RowGroupPanelShow$
        Set group panel visiblity
        See Also:
        BBjGridExWidget.GRID_GROUPPANEL_SHOW_HIDDEN, BBjGridExWidget.GRID_GROUPPANEL_SHOW_VISIBLE, BBjGridExWidget.GRID_GROUPPANEL_SHOW_ONGROUPING

      • GroupMultiAutoColumn!

        public BBjNumber GroupMultiAutoColumn!
        If using auto column, set to true to have each group in its own column separate column. eg if group by Country then Year, two auto columns will be created, one for country and one for year 1 = enable 0 = disable

      • GroupUseEntireRow!

        public BBjNumber GroupUseEntireRow!
        If grouping, set to true or false (default is false). If true, a group row will span all columns across the entire width of the table. If false, the cells will be rendered as normal and you will have the opportunity to include a grouping column (normally the first on the left) to show the group. 1 = enable 0 = disable

      • GroupIncludeFooter!

        public BBjNumber GroupIncludeFooter!
        If true then includes a 'grand' total across all groups 1 = enable 0 = disable

      • GroupIncludeTotalFooter!

        public BBjNumber GroupIncludeTotalFooter!
        If true then includes group totals within each group level 1 = enable 0 = disable

      • ContextMenu!

        public BBjGridContextMenu ContextMenu!
        The grid context menu

      • AttributesRecord!

        public DataRow AttributesRecord!

      • Debug

        public static BBjNumber Debug

      • setGroupSelectsChildren

        public void setGroupSelectsChildren(BBjNumber x!)
        When true, selecting a group will have the impact of selecting all its children When false, then the group is selectable independently of the child nodes
        Parameters:
        BBJNumber - x!: 1 enable , 0 disable

      • setVisibleRow

        public void setVisibleRow(BBjNumber index!,
BBjString position!)
        Set visible row Ensures the row index is visible by vertically scrolling the grid. The valid values for positions are {'top', 'middle', 'bottom'}. If top, middle or bottom, the grid will scroll the row to place the row at top, middle or bottom
        Parameters:
        BBjNumber - index!: the row index
        BBjString - position!: the scrolling poistion
        See Also:
        GRID_ROWPOS_TOP(), GRID_ROWPOS_MIDDLE(), GRID_ROWPOS_BOTTOM()

      • setFunctionsReadOnly

        public void setFunctionsReadOnly(BBjNumber readonly!)
        Enable/disable changes to group, pivot or values through the GUI This is useful if you want to show the user the group, pivot and values panel, so they can see what columns are used, but prevent them from making changes to the selection. 1 = enable editing 0 = disable edition

      • setGroupMultiAutoColumn

        public void setGroupMultiAutoColumn(BBjNumber bool!)
        If using auto column, set to true to have each group in its own column separate column. eg if group by Country then Year, two auto columns will be created, one for country and one for year 1 = enable 0 = disable

      • setGroupUseEntireRow

        public void setGroupUseEntireRow(BBjNumber bool!)
        If grouping, set to true or false (default is false). If true, a group row will span all columns across the entire width of the table. If false, the cells will be rendered as normal and you will have the opportunity to include a grouping column (normally the first on the left) to show the group. 1 = enable 0 = disable

      • addColumnGroup

        public void addColumnGroup(BBjString id$,
BBjString name$,
BBjVector columns!,
java.lang.Boolean MarryChildren!,
BBjString HeaderClass$)
        Group Vector of Columns
        Parameters:
        BBjString - id$: the group id
        BBjString - name$: the group label/name
        BBjVector - columns!: Vector of columns ids
        BBjInt - MarryChildren!: Set to 'true' to keep columns in this group beside each other in the grid. Moving the columns outside of the group (and hence breaking the group) is not allowed.
        BBjInt - HeaderClass$: Css class to apply

      • addColumnGroup

        public void addColumnGroup(BBjString id$,

BBjVector columns!,
java.lang.Boolean MarryChildren!)
        Group Vector of Columns
        Parameters:
        BBjString - id$: the group id
        BBjString - name$: the group label/name
        BBjVector - columns!: Vector of columns ids
        BBjInt - MarryChildren!: Set to 'true' to keep columns in this group beside each other in the grid. Moving the columns outside of the group (and hence breaking the group) is not allowed.

        public void setColumnImageList(BBjString colname$,
